I have been working in the telecoms field within Orange for 15 years. After spending half of my career on server side developments related to voice communications (H.323, IMS, Intelligent Network), I switched to mobile development on Android. Today, I enjoy cultivating this dual experience and investigate issues happening at the boundary.
